titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation touching the Corporation of Sope-makers of London.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... VVhitehall, the eight and twentieth day of December, in the thirteenth year of His Majesties reign.
Arms 23; Steele notation: preuenit- kers 2) hou- 3) or 4) poli- and.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
